    • saveStatToData

      public void saveStatToData()
      Transfers NbSick and NbRecovered to Data to save them to draw AreaChart. To show correctly superposed layers in AreaChart we take: - NbHealthy taken as 100% (bottom layer) - nbSick = nbSick + NbIncubating + nbRecovered (middle layer) - NbRecovered = NbRecovered (top layer) Superposed they present ratio of these tree values (nbHealthy, nbSick/Incubating and nbRecovered) in 100%
      Specified by:
      saveStatToData in interface Displayable

    • getData

      public Data getData()
      Get saved statistics (history)
      Specified by:
      getData in interface Displayable
      Returns:
      Data - history
